text: Carlton Goring is a male former weightlifter who competed for England. ==Weightlifting career== He represented Guyana in the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Cardiff, Wales. Four years later he represented England and won the gold medal in the -67.5 kg combined category at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Perth, Western Australia. ==Personal life== He was a post office sorter by trade and lived in Tooting. ==References== Category:English male weightlifters Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in weightlifting Category:Commonwealth Games gold medallists for England Category:Weightlifters at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games Category:Weightlifters at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games
title: Carlton Goring
